the layer of mortar (= a mixture of sand, water, and cement) between bricks, etc. in a wall: Is the pointing of the brickwork in good condition?

the activity of putting a layer of mortar (= a mixture of sand, water, and cement) between bricks, etc. in a wall : If the builders build the wall, I can do the pointing.
